actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Human Rights and International Organizations

official_title: A resolution to urge the President to demonstrate his commitment to international human rights by nominating an individual dedicated to the concept of human rights for individuals of all nations to the post of Assistant Secretary of State for Human Rights.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Urges the President to demonstrate his commitment to international human rights by expeditiously nominating an individual dedicated to the concept of human rights to the post of Assistant Secretary of State for Human Rights.

titles.title: A resolution to urge the President to demonstrate his commitment to international human rights by nominating an individual dedicated to the concept of human rights for individuals of all nations to the post of Assistant Secretary of State for Human Rights.
